Category: Facial Cleanser

ntium dulcis (orange) peel extract*, rose extract*, ananas sativus (pineapple) fruit extract.**Denotes plant - or mineral-derived.

Warnings: While Better Life is non-toxic, it's better as a cleaner than a beverage. Don't drink, and keep out of reach of children.
